name: Stay Still 2
description:
Hung, an adventurous risk-taker with an insatiable hunger for extraordinary experiences, seeks out a cheap and creepy house for a thrilling one-day rental. Little does he know that the house has a dark history, with a young girl's murder nearby. Ignoring the warnings, Hung decides to stay, and soon finds himself in the midst of a terrifying nightmare. He encounters the ghost of the murdered girl, setting off a series of haunting trials and challenges. Trapped and hunted in the haunted house, Hung must solve puzzles and face unimaginable horrors in a desperate attempt to escape. The chilling ghost story unravels as Hung's life hangs in the balance, leaving him forever scarred by the terrifying ordeal.





Prepare yourself for a bone-chilling adventure in "Stay Still 2," the thrilling ghost story that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Hung, a risk-taking adventurer, seeks out the most extraordinary experiences. When he stumbles upon a cheap, creepy house with a dark history, he can't resist the temptation to stay for a night filled with spine-tingling thrills.

Explore the eerie house and uncover its haunting past as you encounter mysterious figures and disturbing noises. Piece together clues and solve terrifying puzzles in a desperate attempt to escape the clutches of the vengeful ghost. But beware, the horrors within are beyond imagination!





  • Immerse yourself in a chilling ghost story filled with suspense and mystery.
  • Navigate through the dark and eerie house to confront the ghost's tragic past.
  • Solve diabolical puzzles and riddles to find the key to your survival.
  • Experience heart-pounding moments and a sense of dread that will stay with you long after the game ends.
